CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The resulting PBDT-TDPP-S showed good solubility in common organic solvents , such as chlorobenzene , o-dichlorobenzene , and dichloromethane ( DCM ) , but PBDT - DPP was nearly not soluble in them.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |
| chlorobenzene |
| o-dichlorobenzene |
| dichloromethane (DCM) |
| PBDT-DPP |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |
| chlorobenzene |
| o-dichlorobenzene |
| dichloromethane (DCM) |

(Note: In this context, "PBDT-TDPP-S" and "PBDT-DPP" can be considered material names as they are identified as different materials in the paragraph.)
